title: Lowercase to Uppercase String
description: Write a programme to convert lowercase string to uppercase
contentHtml:
Write a programme to convert lowercase string to uppercase

Input  : hii there
Output : HII THERE

// Write a programme to convert lowercase string to uppercase string

const string = "HII THERE";

function lowercaseToUppercase(str) {
  return str.toLowerCase();
}

console.log("Input  :", string);
console.log("Output :", lowercaseToUppercase(string));


# Write a programme to convert lowercase string to uppercase string

def lowercase_to_uppercase(string):
    return string.upper()


string = "hii there"
print("Input  :", string)
print("Output :", lowercase_to_uppercase(string))


// WAP to convert lowercase to uppercase
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    string ask;
    cout << "Input  : ";
    getline(cin, ask);
    int store;
    cout << "Output : ";
    for (auto i : ask)
    {
        store = i;
        if (store >= 97 && store <= 122)
            store -= 32;
        cout << (char)store;
    }
    cout << endl;
    return 0;
}
